name: adc_ltm_rule_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMRuleList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM rule

    '''

    ltm_rule_list = []
    adc_ltm_rule_list = connect_db.appviewx.lr.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_rule_list:
        ltm_rule_list.append(device)
    return ltm_rule_list
description: To get a list of LTM rule
_keywords: To get a list of LTM rule
